author: Tom Carreras, Stephen Alpher
title: Crypto Cracks Late in Day, Bitcoin Slumps Below $106K
description: Troubling macro headlines concerning the Middle East and tariffs failed to shake U.S. stocks, but cryptocurrencies sold off.
content:
Cryptocurrencies were broadly lower on Thursday, with the selloff picking up steam in the early U.S. evening hours.
Bitcoin
